key_points: Vice President Harris emphasizes her career-long fight against gun violence.
Harris highlights the tragedies and consequences of gun violence she has witnessed.
She asserts that solutions to gun violence already exist and calls for the courage to implement them.
Harris credits President Joe Biden for having the will and courage to tackle gun violence.
She recounts Biden's history of confronting the gun lobby, including passing significant legislation as a senator.
The Vice President reminds that Biden had a role in the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act, which established background checks.
Harris also notes Biden's effort to pass a law banning assault weapons and high-capacity magazines for a decade.
She recalls Biden's actions to reduce gun violence as Vice President under the Obama administration.
Harris portrays Biden as a leader with determination, will, and empathy for victims of gun violence.
Vice President Harris introduces President Joe Biden, highlighting his commitment to the fight against gun violence.
